text: Martin Špegelj (11 November 1927 – 11 May 2014) was a Croatian politician. He was the second Defense Minister of Croatia and the chief of staff of the Croatian army and inspector-general of the army. Špegelj died from unknown causes in Zagreb, Croatia, aged 87. ==References== Category:1927 births Category:2014 deaths Category:Croatian politicians
title: Martin Špegelj
